Package com.vagsoft.bookstore.controllers

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
com.vagsoft.bookstore.controllers.OrderController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/orders") @Validated(OrderedValidation.class) public class OrderController extends Object
REST controller for endpoints related to orders

  • Method Details

    • getOrders

      @IsAdmin @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<OrderReadDTO>> getOrders(@RequestParam(name="userID",required=false) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsResource(repository=UserRepository.class,nullable=true,message="User with given ID does not exist",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer userID, @RequestParam(name="minTotalAmount",required=false) @Min(value=0L,message="minTotalAmount must be equal or greater than 0",groups=BasicValidation.class) @Min(value=0L,message="minTotalAmount must be equal or greater than 0",groups=BasicValidation.class) Double minTotalAmount, @RequestParam(name="maxTotalAmount",required=false) @Min(value=0L,message="maxTotalAmount must be equal or greater than 0",groups=BasicValidation.class) @Min(value=0L,message="maxTotalAmount must be equal or greater than 0",groups=BasicValidation.class) Double maxTotalAmount, @RequestParam(name="status",required=false) Status status, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a page of orders filtered by the specified parameters
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user who placed the orders (optional)
      minTotalAmount - the minimum total amount of the orders to search for (optional)
      maxTotalAmount - the maximum total amount of the orders to search for (optional)
      status - the status of the orders to search for (optional)
      pageable - the pagination information (optional)
      Returns:
      a page of orders

    • getOrderByID

      @IsAdmin @GetMapping(path="/{orderID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<OrderReadDTO> getOrderByID(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsResource(repository=OrderRepository.class,message="Order with given ID does not exist",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer orderID)
      Retrieves an order by its ID
      Parameters:
      orderID - the ID of the order to retrieve
      Returns:
      the order with the specified ID

    • updateOrderByID

      @IsAdmin @PutMapping(path="/{orderID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<OrderReadDTO> updateOrderByID(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsResource(repository=OrderRepository.class,message="Order with given ID does not exist",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer orderID, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid OrderUpdateDTO orderUpdateDTO)
      Updates an order by its ID with the given order information
      Parameters:
      orderID - the ID of the order to be updated
      orderUpdateDTO - the new order information
      Returns:
      the updated order

    • getOrders

      @GetMapping(path="/me") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<OrderReadDTO>> getOrders(@RequestParam(name="minTotalAmount",required=false) @Min(value=0L,message="minTotalAmount must be equal or greater than 0",groups=BasicValidation.class) @Min(value=0L,message="minTotalAmount must be equal or greater than 0",groups=BasicValidation.class) Double minTotalAmount, @RequestParam(name="maxTotalAmount",required=false) @Min(value=0L,message="maxTotalAmount must be equal or greater than 0",groups=BasicValidation.class) @Min(value=0L,message="maxTotalAmount must be equal or greater than 0",groups=BasicValidation.class) Double maxTotalAmount, @RequestParam(name="status",required=false) Status status, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a page of orders for the authenticated user, filtered by the specified parameters
      Parameters:
      minTotalAmount - the minimum total amount of the orders to search for (optional)
      maxTotalAmount - the maximum total amount of the orders to search for (optional)
      status - the status of the orders to search for (optional)
      pageable - the pagination information (optional)
      Returns:
      a page of orders

    • getOrderMeByID

      @GetMapping(path="/me/{orderID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<OrderReadDTO> getOrderMeByID(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsCompositeResource(repository=OrderRepository.class,methodName="existsByUser_IdAndId",useJWT=true,secondPathVariable="orderID",message="The order with the given ID does not exist in your submitted orders",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer orderID)
      Retrieves an order by its ID, accessible only to the user who placed the order.
      Parameters:
      orderID - the ID of the order to retrieve
      Returns:
      the order with the specified ID
